title: After School Trip to Kiyomizu
body:
I really want to explore Kiyomizu today. Who wants to join me? 
Potential Itinerary: 
 1. Take Train 
 2. Walk around kiyomizu 
 3. Eat Okonomiyake for dinner

title: Weekend Trip to Osaka
body:
I really want to explore Osaka this weekend. Looking for 3 more people in join! 
 Potential Itinerary: 
 1. Take Train to Osaka around noon 
 2. Check-in to Airbnb 
 3. Eat skewers at Dotonbori 
 4. Go to the coast

comments.body: Are we coming back on Sunday?
